allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process | Where-Object {$_ProcessName -like ''*go*'' -or $_ProcessName -like ''*install*'' -or $_ProcessName -like ''*msi*''} | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, CPU | Format-Table")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process msiexec -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host ''MSI processes killed''")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process -Name ''*setup*'',''*install*'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host ''Installer processes killed''")
